an6.59:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava natike viharati ginjakavasathe.
an6.59:1.3: Atha kho darukammiko gahapati yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho darukammikam gahapatim bhagava etadavoca:
an6.59:1.4: “api nu te, gahapati, kule danam diyati”ti?
an6.59:1.6: Tanca kho ye te bhikkhu arannika pindapatika pamsukulika arahanto va arahattamaggam va samapanna, tatharupesu me, bhante, bhikkhusu danam diyati”ti.
an6.59:2.1: “Dujjanam kho etam, gahapati, taya gihina kamabhogina puttasambadhasayanam ajjhavasantena, kasikacandanam paccanubhontena, malagandhavilepanam dharayantena, jataruparajatam sadiyantena ime va arahanto ime va arahattamaggam samapannati.
an6.59:3.1: Aranniko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato unnalo capalo mukharo vikinnavaco mutthassati asampajano asamahito vibbhantacitto pakatindriyo.
an6.59:3.3: Aranniko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato anunnalo acapalo amukharo avikinnavaco upatthitassati sampajano samahito ekaggacitto samvutindriyo.
an6.59:4.1: Gamantavihari cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato …pe…
an6.59:4.3: Gamantavihari cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato …pe…
an6.59:5.1: Pindapatiko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato …pe…
an6.59:5.3: Pindapatiko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato …pe…
an6.59:6.1: Nemantaniko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato …pe…
an6.59:6.3: Nemantaniko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato …pe…
an6.59:7.1: Pamsukuliko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato …pe…
an6.59:7.3: Pamsukuliko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato …pe…
an6.59:8.1: Gahapaticivaradharo cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato unnalo capalo mukharo vikinnavaco mutthassati asampajano asamahito vibbhantacitto pakatindriyo.
an6.59:8.3: Gahapaticivaradharo cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato anunnalo acapalo amukharo avikinnavaco upatthitassati sampajano samahito ekaggacitto samvutindriyo.
an6.59:9.1: Ingha tvam, gahapati, sanghe danam dehi.
an6.59:9.2: Sanghe te danam dadato cittam pasidissati.
an6.59:9.3: So tvam pasannacitto kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjissasi”ti.
